item.title: Anyone know how to fix doors? rep++ if help :) (with video, for more info)
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

[code]if (objectID == OBJECTID) {
door();
switch (objectX) {//AKA x coordinate of door

                    case 2965://2965 == y coordinate of door
                        if (objectY == 3338) {
                            ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, objectID, -1, 0);// -1 = face it opens
                        }
                        break;
                    default://if not specified for object id replace - 2
                        ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, objectID, -2, 0);
                        break;
                }
            }[/code]

In case 132.

Read full topic
